verses.verse: Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to those who <S%H5030>prophesy<s%> from their own <S%H3820>inspiration,<s%> <S%H8085>'Listen<s%> to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord!<s%>

<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H1945>"Woe<s%> to the <S%H5036>foolish<s%> <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are <S%H1980>following<s%> <S%H310><s%> their own <S%H7307>spirit<s%> and have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H1115>nothing.<s%>
"O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> have <S%H1961>been<s%> like <S%H7776>foxes<s%> among <S%H2723>ruins.<s%>

"You have not <S%H5927>gone<s%> up into the <S%H6556>breaches,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> did you <S%H1443>build<s%> the <S%H1443>wall<s%> <S%H5921>around<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"They <S%H2372>see<s%> <S%H7723>falsehood<s%> and <S%H3577>lying<s%> <S%H7081>divination<s%> who are <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5002>declares,<s%> 'when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has not <S%H7971>sent<s%> them; yet they <S%H3176>hope<s%> for the <S%H6965>fulfillment<s%> of [their] <S%H1697>word.<s%>

"Did you not <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H4236>vision<s%> and <S%H559>speak<s%> a <S%H3577>lying<s%> <S%H4738>divination<s%> when you <S%H559>said,<s%> 'The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5002>declares,<s%> 'but it is not I who have <S%H1696>spoken<s%>?"' "

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3282>"Because<s%> you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H7723>falsehood<s%> and <S%H2372>seen<s%> a <S%H3577>lie,<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> you," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

"So My <S%H3027>hand<s%> will be <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> who <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H7723>visions<s%> and <S%H7080>utter<s%> <S%H3577>lying<s%> <S%H7080>divinations.<s%> They will <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1961>place<s%> in the <S%H5475>council<s%> of My <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> will they be <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H3789>down<s%> in the <S%H3791>register<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> will they <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

"It is <S%H3282>definitely<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> they have <S%H2937>misled<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> by <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7965>'Peace!<s%>' when <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7965>peace.<s%> And when <S%H1931>anyone<s%> <S%H1129>builds<s%> a <S%H2434>wall,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they <S%H2902>plaster<s%> it <S%H2902>over<s%> with <S%H9648>whitewash;<s%>

[so] <S%H559>tell<s%> those who <S%H2902>plaster<s%> it <S%H2902>over<s%> with <S%H9648>whitewash,<s%> that it will <S%H5307>fall.<s%> A <S%H7857>flooding<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%> will <S%H1961>come,<s%> and you, O <S%H417>hailstones,<s%> <S%H68><s%> will <S%H5307>fall;<s%> and a <S%H9370>violent<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> will <S%H1234>break<s%> out.

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> when the <S%H7023>wall<s%> has <S%H5307>fallen,<s%> will you not be <S%H559>asked,<s%> <S%H346>'Where<s%> is the <S%H2915>plaster<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H2902>plastered<s%> [it]?'"

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "I will make a <S%H9370>violent<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H1234>break<s%> out in My <S%H2534>wrath.<s%> There will also be in My <S%H639>anger<s%> a <S%H7857>flooding<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%> and <S%H417>hailstones<s%> <S%H68><s%> to <S%H3615>consume<s%> [it] in <S%H2534>wrath.<s%>

"So I shall <S%H2040>tear<s%> <S%H2040>down<s%> the <S%H7023>wall<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H2902>plastered<s%> <S%H2902>over<s%> with <S%H9648>whitewash<s%> and <S%H5060>bring<s%> it <S%H5060>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> so that its <S%H3247>foundation<s%> is <S%H1540>laid<s%> <S%H1540>bare;<s%> and when it <S%H5307>falls,<s%> you will be <S%H3615>consumed<s%> in its <S%H8432>midst.<s%> And you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"Thus I shall <S%H3615>spend<s%> My <S%H2534>wrath<s%> on the <S%H7023>wall<s%> and on those who have <S%H2902>plastered<s%> it <S%H2902>over<s%> with <S%H9648>whitewash;<s%> and I shall <S%H559>say<s%> to you, 'The <S%H7023>wall<s%> is <S%H369>gone<s%> and its <S%H2902>plasterers<s%> are <S%H369>gone,<s%>

[along with] the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and who <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2377>visions<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> for her when <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

"Now you, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of your <S%H5971>people<s%> who are <S%H5012>prophesying<s%> from their own <S%H3820>inspiration.<s%> <S%H5012>Prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them,

and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H1945>"Woe<s%> to the women who <S%H8609>sew<s%> [magic] <S%H3704>bands<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3027>wrists,<s%> <S%H679><s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H4555>veils<s%> for the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of [persons] of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6967>stature<s%> to <S%H6679>hunt<s%> <S%H6679>down<s%> <S%H5315>lives!<s%> Will you <S%H6679>hunt<s%> <S%H6679>down<s%> the <S%H5315>lives<s%> of My <S%H5971>people,<s%> but <S%H2421>preserve<s%> the <S%H5315>lives<s%> [of others] for yourselves?

"And for <S%H8168>handfuls<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> and <S%H9465>fragments<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> you have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> Me to My <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death<s%> <S%H5315>some<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> should not <S%H4191>die<s%> and to <S%H2421>keep<s%> <S%H5315>others<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> should not <S%H2421>live,<s%> by your <S%H3576>lying<s%> to My <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H3577>lies.<s%>"' "

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> your [magic] <S%H3704>bands<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H6679>hunt<s%> <S%H5315>lives<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> as <S%H9458>birds,<s%> and I will <S%H7167>tear<s%> them <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> your <S%H2220>arms;<s%> and I will <S%H7971>let<s%> them <S%H7971>go,<s%> <S%H853>even<s%> those <S%H5315>lives<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H6679>hunt<s%> as <S%H9458>birds.<s%>

"I will also <S%H7167>tear<s%> off your <S%H4555>veils<s%> and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> from your <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and they will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> be in your <S%H3027>hands<s%> to be <S%H9287>hunted;<s%> and you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H3282>"Because<s%> you <S%H3512>disheartened<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> with <S%H8267>falsehood<s%> when I did not <S%H3510>cause<s%> him <S%H3510>grief,<s%> but have <S%H2388>encouraged<s%> <S%H3027><s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> not to <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> [and] <S%H2421>preserve<s%> his <S%H2421>life,<s%>

<S%H3651>therefore,<s%> you women will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H7723>visions<s%> or <S%H7080>practice<s%> <S%H7081>divination,<s%> and I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> out of your <S%H3027>hand.<s%> Thus you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> "
